When a creature you control scavenges Harvest Reaper, search your library for a colorless card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Scavenge {4} [i]({4}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
